The correct answer is D: [00:04:20 - 00:05:07]. 

In the provided excerpt, the host mentions that after the break, they will learn how to use a lightsaber and introduce Coach Angel from Never Quit Boxing. In this segment of the audio, two women are engaging in a playful duel with pink lightsabers. As they duel, laughter and punch-like sound effects are heard. One of the women exclaims, "No, you killed me too soon," indicating that one woman has defeated the other in the duel.
